column4: is there a driver i can install to make my computer support the correct resolution i need?
umm update to the most recent display driver and then edit the xorg.conf for your res if its not set correctly
how do i update my driver? apt-get update? and where is xorg.conf located do you konw?
first find what video card you have installed, ATI or NVIDIA or other, then do what BenjaminJohnsto1 said
